name: Blue Moon
description: Blue Moon(ブルームーン),orAoi Tsuki(青い月), is the pseudonym of one of the members of theJapanesegirl groupUs Cracks. AJapanesedescendent born in theNUSA, Blue Moon was among the three girls chosen to sign a deal withMSM MediaCorp, who at the time were looking for candidates with the perfect blend of charisma, talent and stage presence in order to complete against the more successfulAIsmaking music - the other two beingRed MenaceandPurple Force. NamedUs Cracks, the band swiftly became a world sensation. Being part of a globally-followed music sensation, Blue is not a stranger to psychofans. Once one...
